|flash1type = Serial(SPI) |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/20/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192CE; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "AP699E9N3.CT1738-5-DB-DL" ([[SGE]]) and "REV1.0" appears :to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The device is shown as using two '''Airgain''' N2430GND antennas. :RTL8192DR is assumed to be used for the 5GHz radio.
Two power supplies are shown in the FCC external photos... *one is a '''Shenzhen Frecom Electronics Co., Ltd.''' F05W-120050SPAU :(100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, max. 0.19A -> 12VDC, 0.5A) *another is a '''Shenzhen Gongjin Electronics Co., Ltd.''' S06A22-120A050-PB :(100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, max. 0.3A -> 12VDC, 0.5A).
This model is shown to sit upright (like [[ZyXEL NBG5715]]) in the FCC manual.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
